definition: flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful
powder/cosmetic face powder/food prepared from starch/noodles or pasta made from any kind of flour/whitewash/white/pink

sentences.english: Continuous ongoing efforts are necessary for the eradication of hay fever.
sentences.chinese: 這些持續不斷的努力都是消除花粉症的需要。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the sickness and the relevant instances caused by the hay fever of Artemisia pollen.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討由蒿屬等花粉症引起的疾病及相關情況。

sentences.english: Fortunately, there is a range of products available to treat the symptoms of hay fever .
sentences.chinese: 所幸的是，有一系列的產品可供治療的症狀，花粉症。

sentences.english: It will unblock a stuffy nose and can help alleviate asthma and hay fever.
sentences.chinese: 它能夠通暢鼻塞，並能幫助緩解哮喘和花粉症。

sentences.english: See your GP if you think you have hay fever .
sentences.chinese: 看到你的家庭醫生，如果你認爲你有花粉症。

sentences.english: Hay fever is the most common type of allergy problem.
sentences.chinese: 花粉症，是最常見的過敏問題的類型。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the effective means to the therapy of servicemans pollinosis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討軍人花粉症治療的有效方法。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the therapeutic effect of compound glycyrrhizin injection on pollinosis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討美能注射液治療花粉症療效。

sentences.english: Hay fever is caused by outdoor allergens.
sentences.chinese: 花粉症是由戶外過敏原。

sentences.english: Conclusion Compound glycyrrhizin injection is clearly effective on the treatment of pollinosis without obvious adverse reaction.
sentences.chinese: 結論美能注射液治療花粉症療效顯著，無明顯副作用。

sentences.english: I don't like spring because I have hay fever .
sentences.chinese: 我不喜歡春天是因爲我有過敏性花粉症。

sentences.english: Pollinosis is one kind of the allergic diseases which is threatening the people's health.
sentences.chinese: 花粉症是近年來嚴重困擾人們生活的一類過敏症狀。

definition: bacterial tracheitis (inflammation of the windpipe, often caused by Staphylococcus aureus)/henpecked (a pun on 妻子管得严 used in comic theater)
